name: Agricultural Land Occupation
description: The occupation of agricultural land by human activities

name: Climate Change
description: The potential impact on global warming due to greenhouse gas emissions

name: Fossil Depletion
description: The consumption of non-renewable fossil fuel resources

name: Human Toxicity
description: The potential impact on human health due to exposure to toxic substances

name: Marine Ecotoxicity
description: The potential impact on marine ecosystems due to the release of toxic substances

name: Metal Depletion
description: The consumption of non-renewable metal resources

name: Terrestrial Acidification
description: The potential impact on terrestrial ecosystems due to acidifying substances
